channel.title: Help!
channel.description: yeah I know it's not that much but its literally all I have, OK I need help with a web-client, I uploaded my cache to a direct dl ( fileden ) and put the URL in my client were it goes, I made my client.jar file, and added all the cache methods to my client and redirected my sprites and background to my cache, I pretty much did everything ric914 i think said to do, I tried my desktop client first and it downloaded, unpacked and loaded everything perfectly, I know cause I was able to log on and play around for a few minutes, but when I try it on my webby it downloads and unpacks the client and loads the background and says "connecting to fileserver" but then gets this error "an error occurred whilst loading elitescape" and it goes black :\ if anyone can make it for me and like tape with hyper cam, what their doing, ( so i can update my client) I will gladly pay you the five dollars I have in paypal. BTW my client base is deltascape v16 and I only pulled filestore32 out of it not mprfilestore32 for the cache. K thanks for any help.

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @jakanddax222 jakanddax222
item.description:
@jakanddax222 wrote:

My cache file is 16 MB’s I have a delta v16 base that came with a folder called cache, inside were two other files: File Store 32 and MPR File Store 32, I only pulled out File Store 32, When Jarring my client I pulled out my cache folder, and directed the jarring to my main client folder, which contained all my .class and .java files. My File Store 32 is the cache folder I made into cache.zip.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

jakanddax222:

yeah I know it’s not that much but its literally all I have, OK I need help with a web-client, I uploaded my cache to a direct dl ( fileden ) and put the URL in my client were it goes, I made my client.jar file, and added all the cache methods to my client and redirected my sprites and background to my cache, I pretty much did everything ric914 i think said to do, I tried my desktop client first and it downloaded, unpacked and loaded everything perfectly, I know cause I was able to log on and play around for a few minutes, but when I try it on my webby it downloads and unpacks the client and loads the background and says “connecting to fileserver” but then gets this error “an error occurred whilst loading elitescape” and it goes black :\ if anyone can make it for me and like tape with hyper cam, what their doing, ( so i can update my client) I will gladly pay you the five dollars I have in paypal. BTW my client base is deltascape v16 and I only pulled filestore32 out of it not mprfilestore32 for the cache. K thanks for any help.

I bet $20 you’re loading client.jar from the same directory as the cache folder? You probably missed something to do with loading the cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

File size of your cache…?

Read full topic
